string-array.item: LOOKS
PRODUCTIVITY
SELFWORTH
SOCIAL
MENTALHEALTH

string-array.name: affirmation_types_entries
string-array.item: Looks
Productivity
Self worth
Social
Mental health

string-array.name: global_affirmations
string-array.item: I believe in my skills and abilities.
My strength is greater than any struggle.
I can do this.
I\'m getting stronger every day.
I am in awe of what I am capable of.
I was not made to give up.
I know my worth.
I choose what I become.
Happiness is within my grasp.
Even outside my comfort zone, I will be comfortable in my own skin.
I am worthy of love and joy.
I do not need other people for happiness.
I choose hope over fear.
Positivity is a choice that I choose to make.
I believe in myself.
I am not my mistakes.
I deserve love, compassion and empathy.
I choose faith over fear.
I deserve rest and relaxation.
I am grateful for the things I have.
I will search for the good that comes, even in bad situations.
I can rely on myself.

string-array.name: looks_affirmations
string-array.item: I am a beautiful person.
I choose to notice the beautiful parts of myself.
I choose to see beauty in my reflection.
This is my body and I love it.
I am not an object, my body deserves respect.
People notice my beauty because I notice my beauty.
My body is an incredible healer.
I patiently allow my body to heal and transform with easy.
I deserve someone who adores me just as I am.
No one is \'out of my league\'. I am a catch.
I will respect my body and listen to its needs.
I accept myself and my appearance.
People find me attractive.
I am attractive and desirable.
I love the way I look.
Every day I am learning to love myself more and more.
I aim for progress, not for perfection.
No one in the world looks just like me and this makes me unique.
I refuse to let my mind bully my body.
I do not need to compare my looks to others because I am beautiful the way I am.
I do not need validation and approval to feel beautiful.
I work out because I love my body, not because I hate it.

string-array.name: productivity_affirmations
string-array.item: I can use my failures as a stepping stone.
I have confidence in my skills.
I am not afraid to be wrong.
Success will be my driving force.
The success of others will not make me jealous. My time will come.
Even if I fail, I will learn and move forward.
I am proud of myself and all that I have accomplished.
There is no wrong decision. Every mistake is a learning point.
I will take action and get things accomplished.
My goals are simple and uncomplicated.
Every day I am getting closer to my goal.
I set clear goals and work to complete them every day.
I am focused, persistent, and will never quit.
I have a plan of action to achieve my desires.
My priorities are clear. I work to finish the most important tasks first.
I only set goals that matter.
When it is needed, I will always find a way.
I am committed to becoming the person I will become.
Success is in my future.
There are no limits to what I can achieve.
Balance is key. I will mix self-care with effort.
My progress is always moving forward.

string-array.name: self_worth_affirmations
string-array.item: I am who I want to be.
No one has the power to make me feel inferior.
I have decided that I am good enough.
I am capable of inspiring others.
I have decided that I am good enough.
I accept myself unconditionally.
I have the power to change my story.
I have the courage to say \'no\'.
It\'s not their job to like me. It\'s mine.
I dare to be different.
I acknowledge my own self-worth.
I am enough.
I believe in the person I dream of becoming.
I matter. I am allowed to say \'no\' to others and \'yes\' to myself.
I am loved and I am wanted.
My intelligence and wisdom grows every day.
I will not apologize for being myself.
Negative self-talk has no place in my life.
I do not need to make self-deprecating jokes to fit in.
I desire to learn new things.
I am unique and a gift to the world.

string-array.name: social_affirmations
string-array.item: I have faith in my social skills
I am confident in the presence of others.
I will speak with confidence and self-assurance.
I will say \'no\' when I do not have the time or inclination to act.
I will not take other people\'s negativity personally.
What I give is what I receive.
My opinion matters.
I treat others fairly and with love.
I am a positive influence and I surround myself with others like me.
Meeting new people enriches my life.
I am confident.
I am connected to people.
Relationships help me grow.
I have a lot to offer.
I love and accept myself. Others will follow my lead.
I can relate to others easily.
I am good at talking to people.
I am comfortable around people.
I am an interesting person.
I am a friendly person.
I have a lot to talk about and people want to hear what I have to say.
I deserve friendship.
I am comfortable talking to people I do not know.

string-array.name: mental_health_affirmations
string-array.item: I know what I am doing. I will be okay.
I replace fearful thoughts with positive ones.
I notice that negative thinking patterns are disintegrating.
I acknowledge, welcome and boldly accept praise and compliments.
When I need help, I know to ask for it.
I deserve to ask for help.
I am enough, no proof required.
I have faith in myself and my future.
I am a good person who deserves good things.
My feelings are just as valid as anyone else\'s.
I am capable of tuning out the negative.
I approve of who I am and that is enough.
My life is very dear to me.
I deserve amazing experiences.
Being alone with myself is comfortable and peaceful.
I am loveable.
I understand myself, no one else has to.
It is okay for me to make mistakes.
It is okay not to feel okay. I will overcome this.
I do not need permission to take care of myself.
The little things in life make all the difference.
My fear diminishes as I live my life with courage.
I am strong.
Change provides me with new opportunities.
I am not my flaws.
My negative thoughts do not control me.
I am not alone in this.
I am stronger than my anxiety.
I give myself permission to slow down.
I will take the time to put myself first.
Would I expect this of anyone else?
I feel free to give myself the tender, love and care I need.
